terms: Flyttsmart’s user agreement applies to the use of this service
needHelp: Get help from a moving expert!
contactDescription: Don’t hesitate getting in touch! We can solve pretty much anything move related!
dialogDescriptionTop: Get in touch and we’ll help you with the move!
dialogDescriptionBottom: Would you rather be contacted by us?

INVITE.tooltipMessage: Send it to everyone that deserves an easy move!

SHOWCLEANING.whyOrder: Why should I book show cleaning?
SHOWCLEANING.whyOrderAnswer: A freshly cleaned and well-kept home gives a positive impression and helps potential buyers imagine living in the home. Professional cleaning can also emphasize the home's best features and make it more attractive, which can increase its market value and thus facilitate sales.
SHOWCLEANING.whatIsIncluded: VWhat is included in the service?
SHOWCLEANING.whatIsIncludedAnswer: We clean all living rooms, kitchen and dining area, bathrooms and toilets, laundry room and entrance hall.
SHOWCLEANING.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: After the booking is made, you will receive a booking confirmation via email and the selected performer will contact you to ensure that all information is correct and to determine the final details such as time and the like.

MOVECLEAN.whyOrder: Why should I book move cleaning?
MOVECLEAN.whyOrderAnswer: Booking move cleaning is a good idea as professional cleaning companies have the knowledge and expertise required to thoroughly clean your old accommodation and ensure it meets the requirements required for inspection or handover. They are equipped with specialized cleaning tools and products to tackle even the toughest stains and dirt. Professional cleaning can also emphasize the home's best features and make it more attractive, which can increase its market value and thus facilitate sales.
MOVECLEAN.whyOrderAnswerText2: In addition, a satisfaction-customer guarantee applies to all our contractors, which means that they carry out a redecoration if those who move in are not satisfied with the result.
MOVECLEAN.whatIsIncluded: What is included in the service?
MOVECLEAN.whatIsIncludedAnswer: This is included in the moving cleaning: We follow the real estate association's recommendations for moving cleaning. All rooms in the residence are thoroughly cleaned according to a checklist.
MOVECLEAN.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: After the booking is made, you will receive a booking confirmation via email and the selected performer will contact you to ensure that all information is correct and to determine the final details such as time and the like.

MOVEHELP.whyOrder: Why should I book move help?
MOVEHELP.whyOrderAnswer: Hiring moving help is a good idea because professional moving companies have experience in packing and handling furniture and possessions in a safe and efficient manner. They have the right equipment and resources to handle heavy lifting and transport your belongings safely to your new home.
MOVEHELP.whyOrderAnswerText2: In addition, you save time and energy by entrusting the move to experts, which gives you the opportunity to focus on other important parts of the move.
MOVEHELP.whatIsIncluded: What is included in the service?
MOVEHELP.whatIsIncludedAnswer: This is included in the move help service:
MOVEHELP.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: Collection of all your household goods
MOVEHELP.whatIsIncludedAnswer_4: Transport to your new address or other designated location
MOVEHELP.whatIsIncludedAnswer_6: Many contractors also offer additional services, such as packing and storage. You can add these services once you have made contact with the contractor.
MOVEHELP.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: After the booking is made, you will receive a booking confirmation via email and the selected performer will contact you to ensure that all information is correct and to determine the final details such as time and the like.

ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrder: Why should I register a new address
ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrderAnswer: It is mandatory to register your new address with the Tax Agency, if you are going to live there for more than 6 months.
ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrderAnswerText_2: Being registered at the correct address is important for several reasons:
ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrderAnswerText_3: Your civil registration address determines how much tax you have to pay and your right to various benefits and allowances, such as child and housing allowance.
ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrderAnswerText_4: Your civil registration address is forwarded to various authorities and companies, so that they can contact you. Försäkringskassan, the Swedish Migration Agency, CSN as well as major banks and insurance companies are some examples
ADDRESSCHANGE.whyOrderAnswer_url_text: Read more about the notification of relocation
ADDRESSCHANGE.whatIsIncluded: When should I register my new address?
ADDRESSCHANGE.whatIsIncludedAnswer: We recommend that you register your new address as soon as possible.
ADDRESSCHANGE.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: Your new address is valid from the day you move in, if you make your move notification no later than one week after the move. If you report later, your new address applies from the day the report was received by the Tax Agency.
ADDRESSCHANGE.whatHappensAfterOrder: Can I register my children and partner to the new address as well?
ADDRESSCHANGE.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: Yes, you can file a moving notice for children under 18 years of age, for whom you are the guardian and who are registered with you in the national register. You can also register your spouse or registered partner, if he or she is registered at the same address as you.

POWER.whyOrder: Is electricity included in my rent/monthly fee?
POWER.whyOrderAnswer: Electricity is usually not included in the rent/monthly fee. However, it is becoming more common for housing associations and owners of multi-family buildings to sign a joint electricity contract. It is usually a little cheaper for you as a user.
POWER.whyOrderAnswerText_2: Unfortunately, we do not know what applies in your particular residence. Ask your property owner or condominium association for a sure answer to this question.
POWER.whatIsIncluded: How do I cancel my current electricity contract?
POWER.whatIsIncludedAnswer: When you sign a new electricity contract at Flyttsmart, you can take the opportunity to terminate your current one. Just tick the 'Cancel current electricity contract' box and specify the date the electricity should be turned off, and we'll take care of the rest.
POWER.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: Please note that we can only cancel contracts signed by you personally.
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrder: Which electricity contracts do I need to sign for my new home?
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: To get access to electricity in your new home, you need to sign two different agreements:
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_2: Electricity network agreement, so that the electricity reaches the home
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_3: Electricity trading agreement, for your ongoing electricity consumption
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_4: When you fix the electricity at Flyttsmart, you can choose between several proposals for electricity trade agreements. We have selected the best options at your new address and pushed the prices down.
POWER.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_5: At the same time, you sign an electricity network agreement with the supplier that owns the electricity network in your new residential area. Here, in other words, you cannot choose between different suppliers. You don't need to contact the supplier – we'll take care of it for you.

INTERNET.whyOrder: Is broadband included in my rent/monthly fee?
INTERNET.whyOrderAnswer: Many condominium associations and landlords have signed a so-called group agreement for broadband. This means that all residents can use the internet for a cost that is often included in the rent/monthly fee to the association.
INTERNET.whyOrderAnswerText_2: If there is a group agreement at your new address, you will receive information about it when you get internet at Flyttsmart.se. In other words, you don't have to worry about signing double contracts.
INTERNET.whatIsIncluded: How do I cancel my current broadband?
INTERNET.whatIsIncludedAnswer: It depends on which broadband provider you have today - the providers have different procedures for termination.
INTERNET.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: In the list below you can see what applies to your supplier.
INTERNET.whatHappensAfterOrder: My account is bound to a different provider. What should I do?
INTERNET.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: Many broadband providers have a commitment period (often 12, 18 or 24 months). This means that you have to pay for this entire period, even if you want to end the subscription early.
INTERNET.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_2: The suppliers rarely make exceptions when it comes to the commitment period. However, it is not impossible that you can move with your current subscription, or leave it to the person who moves in after you. It can often be arranged directly on the supplier's website.

HOMEALARM.whyOrder: What is included in the home alarm from Flyttsmart?
HOMEALARM.whyOrderAnswer: The basic package includes home alarm Nookbox Hub, control panel, motion detector, magnetic contact, as well as delivery and pre-configuration with an added user.
HOMEALARM.whyOrderAnswerText_2: You also get access to an app where you can control the system and check alarm status, instructional videos for installation and use, and customer service for product questions.
HOMEALARM.whyOrderAnswerText_3: In addition to the basic package, you can make a number of options that suit your accommodation and your needs. Examples of options are installation, alarm service, fire alarms with smoke detectors and extra motion detectors.
HOMEALARM.whatIsIncluded: How does the home alarm from Flyttsmart work with my smart home?
HOMEALARM.whatIsIncludedAnswer: With the app included in our basic package, you can easily add and control several 'smart' products. The system supports ZIGBEE and is compatible with, among others, IKEA.
HOMEALARM.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: Examples of 'smart' products that you can control with the app

HOMECLEANING.whyOrder: What is included in the house cleaning?
HOMECLEANING.whyOrderAnswer: When you book home cleaning with Flyttsmart, every corner of your home will be sparkling clean and tidy. You choose how often you want cleaning: once a week, every two weeks or once a month.
HOMECLEANING.whyOrderAnswerText_2: The following is included in the house cleaning:
HOMECLEANING.whatIsIncluded: Can I make a tax deduction for house cleaning?
HOMECLEANING.whatIsIncludedAnswer: Yes, house cleaning is counted as a household service and is therefore entitled to tax deduction.
HOMECLEANING.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: The maximum sum for tax deductions is SEK 75,000 per year (of which a maximum of SEK 50,000 tax deductions).
HOMECLEANING.whatIsIncludedAnswer_3: You can see your current route balance when you are logged in to Flyttsmart. Just click on 'unused box deduction' at the top right and identify yourself with bankID to retrieve your data from the Swedish Tax Agency.
HOMECLEANING.whatHappensAfterOrder: Do I need to buy home cleaning materials before the house cleaning?
HOMECLEANING.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: No, when you book home cleaning with Flyttsmart, a starter kit with cleaning materials (value SEK 650) is included. We take the kit with us on the first cleaning occasion. The only thing you need to have at home is a vacuum cleaner, plastic bucket and floor mop.
HOMECLEANING.whatHappensAfterOrder_url_text: The following is included in the starter kit

HOMEFIX.whyOrder: Can you help me get organized in my new home after the move?
HOMEFIX.whyOrderAnswer: Yes, together with our selected partners, we can solve everything from simple small fixes to extensive construction projects.
HOMEFIX.whyOrderAnswerText_2: Most of the services are eligible for tax deductions. Of course, we offer a satisfied customer guarantee and can help you even in the evenings and weekends.
HOMEFIX.whatIsIncluded: Can you help me renovate my new home before I move in?
HOMEFIX.whatIsIncludedAnswer: Yes, together with our selected partners, we can solve everything from simple small fixes to extensive construction projects.
HOMEFIX.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: Most of the services are eligible for tax deductions. Of course, we offer a satisfied customer guarantee and can help you even in the evenings and weekends.
HOMEFIX.whatHappensAfterOrder: Can I do tax deductions to help with renovations and simpler crafts?
HOMEFIX.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: Most of the services we offer in the Fix & Renovate category are eligible for tax deductions or tax deductions. For renovation projects of various kinds, the tax deduction applies. Simpler crafts, furniture assembly and technical assistance are counted as household-related services and are thus entitled to tax deductions.
HOMEFIX.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_2: Please note that only the labor cost entitles you to a deduction, not materials or travel costs.
HOMEFIX.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_3: The maximum sum for tax deductions is SEK 75,000 per year (of which a maximum of SEK 50,000 tax deductions).
HOMEFIX.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_4: You can see your current tax deduction balance when you are logged in to Flyttsmart. All you have to do is click on 'Get information from the Tax Agency' at the top right and identify yourself with bankID.

DEFAULT.whyOrder: Can I use tax deductions on services that I buy on Flyttsmart?
DEFAULT.whyOrderAnswer: Yes, many of the services that Flyttsmart offers are eligible for tax deductions.
DEFAULT.whyOrderAnswer_url_text: You can find a complete list of services eligible for deduction here.
DEFAULT.whatIsIncluded: How do you collect and process reviews?
DEFAULT.whatIsIncludedAnswer: We show customer ratings for all our suppliers within moving help and moving cleaning, on a scale of 0–5. The ratings are a combination of our users' reviews and company reviews from Facebook and Google.
DEFAULT.whatIsIncludedAnswer_2: We collect reviews from our users via email 3 days after they have moved into their new home. Then they have the experience of the work done fresh in their memory and can give a fair judgement.
DEFAULT.whatIsIncludedAnswer_3: No one other than the person who used the provider can access the link and leave a review. We always ensure that a given review refers to the right user and the right supplier, before we update the customer rating in our service.
DEFAULT.whatHappensAfterOrder: How much does it cost to use Flyttsmart?
DEFAULT.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: The service is free to use and free of hidden fees.
DEFAULT.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer_2: We offer the same prices as our suppliers - or lower. The prices vary between different suppliers and can also be affected by factors such as how far you are moving and how big your accommodation is.
DEFAULT.whatHappensAfterOrder_url_text: For more questions and answers about flytsmart and our services, click here.
